headline: Smart Infrastructure Market Surges to $2,109.5 billion by 2029 - Dominated by Siemens (Germany), Cisco, (US), Honeywell (US)
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Oct. 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to MarketsandMarkets™, the Smart Infrastructure Market is projected to grow from USD 923.0 billion in 2024 to USD 2,109.5 billion by 2029 at a CAGR of 18.0% during the forecast period.
